messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an impale in the context of combat?
An impale occurs when an attacker achieves an Extreme level of success with a penetrating weapon.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much damage is added to a blunt weapon in an impale scenario?
The damage added is equivalent to the maximum damage bonus.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the maximum damage that a switchblade can inflict?
4 points of damage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can you find a list of impaling weapons?
On Table XVII: Weapons (pages 401-405).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage range for a successful impale attack with a switchblade?
A range of 9 to 12 points of damage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the maximum damage a character can achieve when attacking with a switchblade?
1D4+8 (a range of 9 to 12 points of damage)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill should be used to fight with a chair leg or a kitchen knife?
Fighting (Brawl) skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How are melee weapons categorized?
As the basic weapons category
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of grouping similar weapons together?
For the purpose of weapon skill specializations
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill should be used for complex or cumbersome weapons that don't conform to the basic weapons category?
Weapon specialization skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the general rule for using a weapon specialization skill?
If the weapon is more cumbersome or complex and does not conform to the basic weapons category
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can one find details of weapon groups and specific weapons?
Consult Table XVII: Weapons (pages 401-405)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if Old Man Birch has no skill with a sword?
He would have to use it at the base skill value: Fighting (Sword) 20%
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What percentage of the Fighting (Brawl) skill does Old Man Birch have?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do weapons with similar characteristics and function get grouped?
They are grouped together for the purpose of weapon skill specializations
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill does Old Man Birch use with a knife?
Fighting (Brawl) 40%
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much skill does Old Man Birch have with a sword?
Fighting (Sword) 20%
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can improvised weapons be used with the Fighting (Brawl) skill?
Yes, if similar to a basic melee weapon
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How is the damage done by an improvised weapon determined?
Using a comparable item on Table XVII: Weapons
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should the Keeper do if an improvised weapon is similar to a basic melee weapon?
Use the Fighting (Brawl) skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Keeper to do if the improvised weapon is similar to a basic melee weapon?
Use the Fighting (Brawl) skill.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should be done to add a unique feel to each fight?
Make use of the environment in a fight
